data.text:
Noboru Iguchi (井口昇, Iguchi Noboru) is a Japanese director, writer, and actor.

Profile[]

Name: Noboru Iguchi (井口昇, Iguchi Noboru)

Birth date: June 28, 1969

Birthplace: Tokyo, Japan

Blood type: AB

Height: 5'4" (162cm)

Filmography[]

Director[]

[2003] A Larva to Love

[2003] Heisei Jogakuen Kotobu: 18kin Tairyoku Sokutei Hen Omote & Ura Bajon

[2004] Yochu no Harawata

[2004] Impolite Education

[2005] Kazuo Umezu's Horror Theater: Snake Girl

[2006] Sukeban Boy

[2006] Manji

[2006] The Cat's Eyed Boy

[2007] Sonna Mucha na! (segment "Granny Kiss")

[2008] The Machine Girl

Actor[]

[1993] Down the Drain

[2003] Love Song for Rapper

[2004] Otakus in Love

[2004] Dogs & Cats

[2005] Oppai Seijin

Writer[]

[2003] A Larva to Love

[2004] Yochu no Harawata

[2004] Impolite Education

[2006] Sukeban Boy

[2006] Manji
